description:
The police think you're a bank robber! Find 100 pieces of a photo of the real robber in this single-screen game inspired by classic arcade games!

Simple, retro-style gameplay
Five modes of play
Nonviolent, family friendly
Anyone can play!
name: Hiding Out
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
